an9.37:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
an9.37:1.2: Tatra kho āyasmā ānando bhikkhū āmantesi:
an9.37:1.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṃ.
an9.37:2.2: Yāvañcidaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sambādhe okāsādhigamo anubuddho sattānaṃ visuddhiyā sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāya dukkhadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya.
an9.37:2.3: Tadeva nāma cakkhuṃ bhavissati te rūpā tañcāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedissati.
an9.37:2.4: Tadeva nāma sotaṃ bhavissati te saddā tañcāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedissati.
an9.37:2.5: Tadeva nāma ghānaṃ bhavissati te gandhā tañcāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedissati.
an9.37:2.6: Sāva nāma jivhā bhavissati te rasā tañcāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedissati.
an9.37:2.7: Sova nāma kāyo bhavissati te phoṭṭhabbā tañcāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedissatī”ti.
an9.37:3.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an9.37:3.2: “saññīmeva nu kho, āvuso ānanda, tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedeti udāhu asaññī”ti?
an9.37:3.3: “Saññīmeva kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedeti, no asaññī”ti.
an9.37:4.2: “Idhāvuso, bhikkhu, sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:4.3: Evaṃsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedeti.
an9.37:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:5.2: Evaṃsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedeti.
an9.37:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.37:6.2: Evaṃsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedetīti.
an9.37:7.1: Ekamidāhaṃ, āvuso, samayaṃ sākete viharāmi añjanavane migadāye.
an9.37:7.2: Atha kho, āvuso, jaṭilavāsikā bhikkhunī yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho, āvuso, jaṭilavāsikā bhikkhunī maṃ etadavoca:
an9.37:7.3: ‘yāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, samādhi na cābhinato na cāpanato na ca sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato,
an9.37:7.4: vimuttattā ṭhito, ṭhitattā santusito, santusitattā no paritassati.
an9.37:7.5: Ayaṃ, bhante ānanda, samādhi kiṃphalo vutto bhagavatā’ti?
an9.37:8.1: Evaṃ vutte, sohaṃ, āvuso, jaṭilavāsikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocaṃ:
an9.37:8.2: ‘yāyaṃ, bhagini, samādhi na cābhinato na cāpanato na ca sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato,
an9.37:8.3: vimuttattā ṭhito, ṭhitattā santusito, santusitattā no paritassati.
an9.37:8.4: Ayaṃ, bhagini, samādhi aññāphalo vutto bhagavatā’ti.
an9.37:8.5: Evaṃsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṃ no paṭisaṃvedetī”ti.
